data.full_description: Paper-trading website that allows users to register/login, and mock the act of exchanging stocks/tracking their portfolio. Uses a free api to retreive market data

data.brief_description: Multiplayer game designed for fast performance
data.full_description: A game hosted on a Python website (Tornado framework), allows multiple users to play from different machines. Renders 3d models and animations using WebGL

data.brief_description: Javascript SPA used to display analytics data
data.full_description: A single page application made of Angular components. Displays charts of data collected from my websites. Uses DCjs to render charts that can be filtered
